debug.description: Outlines the grid system so you can visualize the layout.

direction.description: Sets the primary axis the children should be in line with. Options are "horizontal" or "vertical".

flex.description: Optional. Controls the CSS flex property. Options are "grow" "shrink" "basis".

halign.description: Alignment of children along the horizontal axis. Options are "left", "center", "right".

valign.description: Alignment of children along the vertical axis. Options are "top", "center", or "bottom".

wrap.description: Required. Sets whether the children should wrap when there's no more room on the primary axis.
